description: A video of a young man being forced to "apologise" for government criticism has shocked activists.
title: Chechen teen 'tortured' in humiliating video
title_page: Chechen teen 'tortured' in humiliating video - BBC News
maintext: In November 2019 Mr Kadyrov vowed to crackdown on repression, saying "those who are violating harmony between people, those who gossip and cause rows, if we don't stop them by killing them, imprisoning them, or intimidating them, nothing will work".
